ExportItemConfig.Query: SELECT m.id,pro.name,m.t,m.exp,pro.avatar,pro.sex,pro.birthday, pro.phone,lv.name as level_name,m.level,m.state,ac.integral,ac.balance,ac.total_pay, ac.wallet_balance,m.reg_time,m.last_login_time FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN mm_level lv ON lv.id = m.level INNER JOIN mm_account ac ON m.id = ac.member_id INNER JOIN mm_profile pro ON pro.member_id = m.id WHERE (pro.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.user LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR pro.phone LIKE '%{keyword}%') AND ({level_value}<0 OR m.level={level_value}) AND ({state} <0 OR m.state={state}) ORDER BY m.reg_time DESC LIMIT {page_offset},{page_size}
ExportItemConfig.Total: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mm_member m INNER JOIN mm_relation r ON m.id = r.member_id INNER JOIN mm_level lv ON lv.id = m.level INNER JOIN mm_account ac ON m.id = ac.member_id INNER JOIN mm_profile pro ON pro.member_id = m.id WHERE (pro.name LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR m.user LIKE '%{keyword}%' OR pro.phone LIKE '%{keyword}%') AND ({level_value}<0 OR m.level={level_value}) AND ({state} <0 OR m.state={state})
